articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: Max Space unveils plans for commercial space station - SpaceNews
articles.description: Max Space, a startup developing expandable module technologies, plans to build a commercial space station that could launch on a single Falcon 9 rocket.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Max Space, a startup developing expandable module technologies, plans to build a commercial space station that could launch on a single Falcon 9 rocket.
The company unveiled plans Dec. 17… [+4950 chars]
